name: NSPrintPanel.Options
desc: Constants that specify options for configuring the contents of the main Print panel.

items.name: static var showsCopies: NSPrintPanel.Options
items.desc: The Print panel includes a field for manipulating the number of copies being printed.

items.name: static var showsPageRange: NSPrintPanel.Options
items.desc: The Print panel includes a set of fields for manipulating the range of pages being printed.

items.name: static var showsPaperSize: NSPrintPanel.Options
items.desc: The Print panel includes a control for manipulating the paper size of the printer.

items.name: static var showsOrientation: NSPrintPanel.Options
items.desc: The Print panel includes a control for manipulating the page orientation.

items.name: static var showsScaling: NSPrintPanel.Options
items.desc: The Print panel includes a control for scaling the printed output.

items.name: static var showsPrintSelection: NSPrintPanel.Options
items.desc: The Print panel includes an additional selection option for paper range.

items.name: static var showsPageSetupAccessory: NSPrintPanel.Options
items.desc: The Print panel includes a separate accessory view for manipulating the paper size, orientation, and scaling attributes.

items.name: static var showsPreview: NSPrintPanel.Options
items.desc: The Print panel displays a built-in preview of the document contents.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a new instance with the specified raw value.
